definition: gambling get-together/game of cards, mahjong etc
office/situation/classifier for games: match, set, round etc

sentences.english: Any surplus card not part of the deal is removed if found.
sentences.chinese: 一旦發現任何非此牌局的多餘牌張將去除此牌張。

sentences.english: I think we shall have to clear the decks for this one, said Death.
sentences.chinese: 我想我們得爲這個傢伙清出牌局來，死亡說。

sentences.english: When the card game ended, he cashed in his chips and left the gambling house.
sentences.chinese: 牌局結束後，他把籌碼兌換成現金離開賭場。

sentences.english: Then you need a basic function to evaluate a given hand.
sentences.chinese: 然後您需要一個基本函數來評估給定的牌局。

sentences.english: Under you the gambling stake, the checkup gambling house, blusters , even enhances the chip.
sentences.chinese: 你下賭注，覈對牌局，虛張聲勢，甚至提高籌碼。

sentences.english: Is an invitation, to participate in the games, a cheat.
sentences.chinese: 就是別人邀請，參加牌局，在場上出老千嘛。

sentences.english: Who consider no-limit they only pure game left.
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲沒有上限的牌局纔是真正的牌局。

sentences.english: Who consider no-limit they only pure game left.
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲沒有上限的牌局纔是真正的牌局。

sentences.english: The one who loses the most in a poker game is not the worst hand.
sentences.chinese: 那個在牌局中豎排最多的並不一定是打得最爛的。

definition: to bid (bridge and similar card games)
to pour/to pour down (of rain)/to lay a bet
to draw a tile (at mahjong)/to play mahjong
